newsitem.title: USA: Henry Herren joins First Tennessee Capital Markets.
newsitem.headline: Henry Herren joins First Tennessee Capital Markets.

text.p: Former Duncan-Williams Inc vice president Henry Herren has joined First Tennessee Capital Markets in Memphis as a vice president in municipal trading and underwriting, a First Tennessee official said.

Herren, who joined the firm on June 23, replaced JoAnne Woody, a vice president who took early retirement in late May, according to Mike Allen, a senior vice president and manager of First Tennessee's muni trading and underwriting group.
